pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:2.1.6: Saṁvāsa is further defined in bhikkhu-pācittiya 69 at Bu Pc 69:2.1.21.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc56:2.2.2: The commentary at Sp.2.693 defines pakkhasaṅkantā as joining another religion: Pakkhasaṅkantā vāti titthāyatanaṃ saṅkantā, “Pakkhasaṅkantā vā means those who have joined the ascetics of another religion.” Yet the idea of pakkha, “a faction”, also refers to factions within the Sangha, for instance, when the Sangha is split into different communities (nānāsaṁvāsa) that no longer perform legal procedures together.
